about_the_game:
BLAST YOUR WAY THROUGH THE HORDES!

Explore a world of constant dread in this 2D side-scrolling thriller. Uncover the truth behind a deadly outbreak in the remote Nunavut mountains, where a secretive lab's experiment goes horribly wrong. Follow a troubled former soldier on a personal mission to unravel the mystery, delving into a world of mortal danger and chilling discoveries.

LOST IN HELL v1.1 MECHANICS:

Experience precision like never before with our Laser Sight aiming system! Use your mouse to effortlessly lock onto enemies, aiming up and down with ease. But here's the twist: navigate your character through the 2D environment to adjust the depth, allowing you to shoot in any direction.

UNRAVEL THE MYSTERIES ON A DESOLATE LAND!

An ordinary investigation takes a sinister turn as night falls. Confront your fears, uncover strange experiments, and scavenge for resources to battle deadly threats emerging from every corner. These horrors blur the lines between science and myth, buried beneath the facade of human progress.

FIGHT TO SURVIVE THIS NIGHTMARE!

  • MILITARY WEAPONS

  • COMBAT AND EXPLORATION

  • HORDES OF ZOMBIES

  • SINGLE PLAYER CAMPAIGN 10+ HOURS

  • IN-GAME CUTSCENES

content_descriptors.notes:
It's a side-scroller game that immersivelly will put you into panic and shocking situations. 
The game has an eerie and dread atmosphere, it's about shooting and investigating, sometimes gruesome.
You'll experience a thrilling journey with deadly consequences. Be fast to survive a dark and gritty adventure... dungeons, tunnels and old houses with crude aspect populated with wretched monsters from hell.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Vista, Win 7, Win 8, Win 10 (64-bits)
  • Processor: 2.2 gHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10

reviews:
“Very solid game for the price. You can tell it had some actual effort and care put into it, and I had a blast playing it. The art style and 2.5D shooter gameplay might not be for everyone, but it has a charm to it, and works for this game.”
BSAA Jones

“An excellent atmospheric shooter, many types of monsters, gloomy locations and carnage. It can be seen that the developers tried to ensure that the game kept us on our toes!”
OFEN™
short_description: Lost in Hell is a single-player game with endless hordes of monsters, grim characters and gritty scenarios! Blast your way through the evils on this atmospheric side-scrolling, with directional freedom to explore and combat, or to flee your enemies and spare ammo.
